text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed ʙa Alloh va rasuli U va amal ʙa sariati U kardaed, az cizhoe, ki cun ʙaroi sumo oskor savand, anduhginaton mekunand, mapursed. Va agar vaqte, ki Qur'on furud ovarda mesavad, dar ʙorai onho suol kuned, alʙatta ʙaroi sumo ravsan karda mesavad. Alloh ʙa xotiri on ki ʙandagonasro az on avf kunad dar mavridi on cizho sukut kardaast, ki omurzandavu ʙurdʙor ast
